```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
homerange <- read_csv("lab10/data/Tamburelloetal_HomeRangeDatabase.csv")
```

```{r}
homerange
```
```{r}
homerange %>% 
  group_by(class) %>% 
  summarise(min_mass = min(log10.mass),
            max_mass = max(log10.mass),
            mean_mass = mean(log10.mass))
```

```{r}
homerange %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=class, y=log10.mass))+
  geom_boxplot()
```
